addressbook - package addressbook
 
AddressBook - class addressbook.AddressBook.
This class stores and manipulates a set of Entry objects, each of which contains contact details for a single person.

Constructor to create an empty AddressBook.

B

BadRecordException - exception addressbook.BadRecordException.
Thrown to indicate that an individual record in an address book is malformed.

E

Entry - class addressbook.Entry.
